query.statement: SELECT A.PJT, A.HNO, A.SPC, A.TYP, CASE WHEN A.TYN = 'AET' THEN '½Â°­±â¹æ½Ä' WHEN A.TYN = 'ACT' THEN 'Æò¸é¿Õº¹½Ä' WHEN A.TYN = 'AAN' THEN '´ÙÃþ¼øÈ¯½Ä' ELSE '´ÙÃþ¼øÈ¯½Ä' END AS TYN, A.PL, A.CPD, A.RNO, A.CNT, A.HCNT, A.DCNT, A.FMT, A.HMT, A.DMT, A.FMT + A.HMT + A.DMT AMT, A.TOT FROM ( SELECT X.PJT, X.HNO, X.SPC, X.TYP, X.TYN, X.PL, X.CPD, X.RNO, X.CNT, X.HCNT, X.DCNT, CASE WHEN X.CNT = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CASE WHEN X.CPD = 'A' THEN X.FMT WHEN X.CPD = 'B' THEN X.PMT ELSE X.FMT END) / X.CNT,0) END FMT, CASE WHEN X.HCNT = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(X.HMT / X.HCNT,0) END HMT, CASE WHEN X.DCNT = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(X.DMT / X.DCNT,0) END DMT, CASE WHEN X.CPD = 'A' THEN X.FTOT WHEN X.CPD = 'B' THEN X.PTOT ELSE X.FTOT END TOT FROM ( SELECT A.CS302_PJT PJT, A.CS302_HNO HNO, B.ZSPEC12 SPC, B.ZSPEC2 TYP, MAX(A.CS302_TYN) TYN, MAX(B.ZSPEC9) PL, MAX(C.CS301_CPD) CPD, ROW_NUMBER() OVER() RNO, COUNT(*) CNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST302 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS302_TEM = #TEM# AND CS302_RDT = #RDT# AND CS302_SEQ = #SEQ# AND CS302_SIR = #SIR# AND CS302_HMT > 0) HCNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST302 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS302_TEM = #TEM# AND CS302_RDT = #RDT# AND CS302_SEQ = #SEQ# AND CS302_SIR = #SIR# AND CS302_DMT > 0) DCNT, SUM(A.CS302_FMT) FMT, SUM(A.CS302_PMT) PMT, SUM(A.CS302_HMT) HMT, SUM(A.CS302_DMT) DMT, SUM(A.CS302_FMT) + SUM(A.CS302_HMT) + SUM(A.CS302_DMT) FTOT, SUM(A.CS302_PMT) + SUM(A.CS302_HMT) + SUM(A.CS302_DMT) PTOT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST302 A, SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 B, SAPHEE.ZCST301 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS302_PJT = B.POSID AND A.CS302_HNO = SUBSTR(B.POSID_1,7,3) AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS302_TEM = C.CS301_TEM AND A.CS302_RDT = C.CS301_RDT AND A.CS302_SEQ = C.CS301_SEQ AND A.CS302_SIR = C.CS301_SIR AND A.CS302_TEM = #TEM# AND A.CS302_RDT = #RDT# AND A.CS302_SEQ = #SEQ# AND A.CS302_SIR = #SIR# AND C.CS301_GBN = '2' GROUP BY A.CS302_PJT, A.CS302_HNO, B.ZSPEC12, B.ZSPEC2 ) X ) A WHERE A.RNO < 5 WITH UR
